holidays.name: Bake Cookies Day 🍪
holidays.description: A perfect day to whip up some homemade goodies and fill your home with the sweet smells of freshly baked cookies. Whether classic chocolate chip or exotic flavors, it's a day for dough and delight!
holidays.origin: Informal foodie tradition celebrated by baking enthusiasts to enjoy the comfort and joy of homemade cookies during the winter season.
holidays.funFact: Did you know Americans consume approximately 30 billion cookies annually? On Bake Cookies Day, cookie sales soar as people indulge and gift sweet treats!

holidays.name: Answer The Phone Like Buddy The Elf Day ☎️🎄
holidays.description: Channel your inner Buddy the Elf from the movie 'Elf' and answer your phone with boundless enthusiasm and cheer. Spread Christmas spirit by saying something like, 'Buddy the Elf, what's your favorite color?','
holidays.origin: Started by fans of the 2003 holiday film 'Elf' looking to share quirky Christmas joy throughout December.
holidays.funFact: The actor Will Ferrell, who plays Buddy, ad-libbed many of Buddy’s eccentric lines, making the character a beloved quirky holiday icon!

holidays.name: National Vichyssoise Day 🥣
holidays.description: Celebrate the cold creamy potato and leek soup known as Vichyssoise. Often served chilled, this French classic is perfect for winter savory sipping.
holidays.origin: Attributed to French chef Louis Diat, who popularized the chilled soup in the United States in the early 20th century.
holidays.funFact: Vichyssoise is typically served cold, a rarity for potato soups, which are usually warm and hearty.

holidays.name: Underdog Day 🐶
holidays.description: Honor the 'underdogs' of life — the overlooked, underestimated, or just plain quirky individuals and animals who win hearts and stories against the odds.
holidays.origin: Inspired by the animated TV series 'Underdog' from the 1960s; the day encourages rooting for the unlikely heroes.
holidays.funFact: The Underdog cartoon originally aired in New York and became popular for its humorous 'fighting' against big bad villains with classic cheesy catchphrases!
